Quick Select

Categories: Data Structures and Algorithms

Average time complexity: T(n) = O(n) + T(n / 2) = O(n) + O(n / 2) + O(n / 4) + ... + O(1) T(n) = O(n)

Worst case: T(n) = O(n ^ 2)
